38583876.review:
This is a superbly polished IWBTG fangame that serves both as an excellent entry-point into this style of platformers and a rewarding experience for the more experienced IWBTG plaers. It also has online co-op if you'd like to race your buddies.

Highly recommended.

38570001.review: For anyone looking to get into fangames or anyone just looking for a fun platforming experience you should purchase this game, because the difficulty of the levels and the bosses scales up very well as well as having very tight controls. The level design is fun and clever. The only thing I wish for is that there were more worlds. There's a lot of charm and love put into this project by the community that loves the tight platforming games that this game is based off of.

38553008.review:
I have mixed feelings about this, so I'll list some pros and cons

Pros
-Lots of replayability
-Fantastic multiplayer mode that is actually really fun
-Great production value
-Unique gimmicks and ideas

Cons
-Some rooms make you wonder why they thought it was good enough to put into the game
-A lot of the secrets are hastily put together and unfun
-The bosses can get tedious
-The main gimmick is limiting your lives, which is inherently frustrating
-The final boss has an avoidance phase that goes on way too long and is way too learny for a game with limited lives
-Rooms are insanely unbalanced, some being free and some eating 50+ lives
-Dying on a boss takes away 10 lives, which I feel is too big a punishment
-It's the only IWBTG fangame that costs money

Overall, I'm not sure if I'd recommend this.

38507006.review: It's I wanna be the guy but much more polished, fun and challenging game.

38461156.review:
Платформер-рогалик, вдохновленный игрой «I Wanna Be the Guy». Известный персонаж превратился в кота!
Нашему коту дают 100 жизней и кидают в мир, полный опасностей и громадных боссов. Построение уровней различное, все они генерируются случайным образом. С каждой новой игрой мир полностью меняется.
Проходим уровни пока не израсходуем запас жизней. Подбираем монеты и подарки, закупаемся в магазинах. Вы можете покупать дополнительные жизни, предметы, оружие и навыки. Накопив монет можно купить постоянные улучшения, которые останутся у вас даже после того, как вы потеряете все жизни и начнете новую игру.
Кроме этого игра поддерживает мультиплеерный режим. До 8 игроков могут сыграть в гонки на прохождение сгенерированного уровня. Побеждает тот, кто первым придет к финишу.
Все сделано очень качественно. Геймплей сложный, но увлекательный. Игра бросает вызов, который хочется преодолеть!
Придется изрядно попотеть, чтобы пройти игру. Тем более каждая новая игра создает совершенно новый мир. Тут нельзя запомнить последовательность действий и прыжков. Каждая новая комната будет для вас сюрпризом!

38459409.review:
[h1]«I wanna be The Cat»[/h1]
Хардкорный платформер с котом, у которого не 9 жизней, а целых 100!
Игра сделана по подобию «I Wanna Be the Guy» (IWBTG), которая известна своим дизайном и сложностью уровней, нацеленных на унижение игрока.
Геймплей:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vXzhjGFu5xg
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uQtxfwwFGmo

«I wanna be The Cat» радует симпатичным главным героем, красочной графикой и приятной музыкой. Мир в игре довольно большой. Генерируется он случайным образом. Каждая новая игра будет совершенно разной!

Прохождение состоит из нескольких этапов, разделенных на множество экранов. В конце каждого этапа ожидает босс. Всего их 12.

На прохождение дают 100 жизней. Любое прикосновение к шипам отнимает у кота жизнь! В игре есть полоса здоровья, но расходуется она только в битвах с боссами. К счастью, вы можете покупать предметы, навыки и жизни во время прохождения в специальных магазинчиках.

Геймплей хардкорный. Прыгать и умирать будете многократно. Не даром на прохождение щедро отсыпают 100 жизней! Самое забавное, что боссы очень легкие по сравнению с прохождением комнат, утыканных разнообразными конусами и шипами. Усложняет игру механика прыжков: двойной прыжок делается с паузой, при этом чтобы подпрыгнуть выше придется зажимать кнопку + контролировать процесс приземления, чтобы кот не упал задницей на один из многочисленных конусов.

Кроме одиночного режима есть возможность поиграть в онлайн. До 8 игроков могут посоревноваться в прохождении игры. Нужно одновременно с другими пробежать сгенерированный уровень от начала и до конца. Это как групповой забег по длинному, сгенерированному миру. Первый преодолевший все препятствия становится победителем.

[code]Отличный платформер! 100 кошачьих жизней и 10 подгоревших анусов из 10![/code]

[u] Вы можете почитать другие отзывы и подписаться на наших кураторов. Добро пожаловать! [/u] 
[url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/25737869/] 5 minutes of game [/url]

이 게임은 아이워너비더코옵 (I wanna be the co-op)을 만든 제작자입니다.
저는 아이워너비더시리즈를 즐겨했고 그중에서도 이렇게 코옵되며 시크릿맵과 같은 여러 즐길수있는 다양한 맵을 만든 제작자가
유료로 새로 만들었다고해서 바로 질러버렸습니다.
그런데 결과는 약간 아쉽다고 말할수있습니다.
맵은 무조건 한정적인 맵을 계속 반복해서 버티는 게임입니다.
이러면 문제가 깬 맵을 죽고 다시할때 또 계속 보인다는겁니다.
한판에 4번정도 맵이 동일하게 나온걸보면 맵이 그렇게 많지않다는걸 알 수 있습니다.
저는 개인적으로 이 제작자를 믿고 신뢰했으니 추후 업데이트를 보며 기대할테지만
그냥 다른 아이워너비더시리즈를 하시고 오셨던분들은 조금 생각을 하셔야합니다.

38422632.review:
Never thought I'd live to see the day we'll get a commercial fangame on Steam. And boy, am I glad it's actually a good one.

I Wanna Be the Cat is a procedually generated precision platformer, in which you make your way through separate rooms and bosses, while being able to purchase upgrades that will help lowering the overall difficulty.

Every time you run out of lives you'll get separate currency based on how many rooms cleared relative to the difficulty you played on.
This currency allows to purchase permanent passive (perks) and active items upgrades, so technically you'll have a slightly easier time every new run.

The game offers an online racing mode to play against basically anyone who owns the game, platforming through the same rooms you get in the main game. I can guarantee it provides a good entertainment, and even saw some people that purchased the game mainly for the racing feature.

There's also a "Soon"™ mode called "The magic tower" in the main menu to look forward to, along with even more new levels that are awaiting verification to be added to the main game.

For the low price this game goes for, I'd say it's definitely a steal, and totally worth it if you're a paltformers lover.
It offers 3 types of difficulties so it's not too demanding skill-wise, unless you go after achievements which require a higher skill ceiling.

Very happy to see this one on Steam, day 1 purchase from me.

38388100.review:
I Wanna be the Cat is a wonderful game oozing with charm. The game offers a huge amount of variety with the vast amount of rooms, all catering to different difficulties to ensure every player has something they can have fun with, and the promise of future updates with more levels and gamemodes only makes this more exciting.

The single player is a very enjoyable roguelike platforming adventure with whimsical bosses and tricky challenges, always keeping to a high standard of design and polish. A lot of care has been put into the graphics, making the world feel very warm and vibrant, and the added challenges make for many hours of fun with the single-player mode alone.

Where the game hits a real stride is the race mode, allowing up to 8 players to race been a series of maps that are procedurally generated into one another, making for a very comfortable flow whilst you're battling it out with your friends or new opponents. I'd like to see the room-search updated a little as the current state only shows rooms that aren't mid-game, making it tricky to hop into a lobby if you don't even know they exist. Regardless, racing brings a new side to I Wanna be the Guy fangames that hasn't been touched on before, and it's a great deal of fun.

If you're looking for a charming and challenging platformer with a great deal of passion put into it, you'll be right at home with this one.

38386521.review: I wanna be The Cat ist ansichtsweiße ein gutes Spiel. Es ist ein Mix aus Rogue Legacy und I wanna be The Guy. Natürlich kann I wanna be The Cat beide Spiele nicht toppen, ist aber dennoch als Zeitvertreib ganz gut. Jedes mal ändert sich die Levels, jedoch kommt es mir so vor als würde es nicht so viele geben wie bei Rogue Legacy. Sonst für das Geld ist es ein gutes Spiel, aber sicher nicht das beste rogue-like Game.

38385554.review:
Pros:
Challenging, but not too challenging. A perfect balance.

Crisp, clean controls. Makes it feel like it's truly only your fault when you die.
The musical score does a good job of keeping me not too angry to play, too. Nice and calming.

Some bossfights are neat - basing themselves off of Dracula, Painter from Castle Crashers and Kamilia from I Wanna Kill the Kamilia 3, as well as more. Perfectly balanced.

Difficulty scales as you play along.

Cons:
Some screens I feel are incredibly more difficult than the rest of the screens for the level.

Don't use a potion before entering a portal; a glitch (or, it's just intended) resets your health to what it was before you took the potion as you entered the portal.

The cost. (Worth it, though. Forgiving for beginners such as myself)

38349372.review:
So I played this game already almost 20 hours and got 12/25 achievements. Here are my thoughts:

At the moment this game consists of two different modes: 100 lives singleplayer and online racing.

First the singleplayer: 
Based on the sentence: 'A cat has nine lives' Nemega added 91 and lets you beat a randomly chosen set of levels in multiple worlds. 
Between the levels you can find chests and shops with items which you can buy with ingame currency. Also at a certain point in the world and at the end there are bosses. They are funny parodies of bosses which are popular in the I wanna be the guy fanbase.  
There are three difficulties to choose from: Medium, Hard and Impossible.
Medium is the perfect difficulty for beginners. Hard and impossible have harder bosses with added phases and overall more challenging levels.
If you lose all your lives in a run you can buy perks with coins for the following rounds. These consist of useful items, added lives and many more.

Now on to the online racing:
In this mode you can create your own room or join one to play a randomly chosen set of levels in a race. Up to eight players can try to reach the goal first. Even if you don't have any players to race against, you can play it alone and train your movement.
This mode also consists of three difficulties: Easy, Medium and Hard. In each one you need to beat a different amount of levels to finish the race.
I really need to say that this mode is addicting. I think I played this mode four hours straight with a full lobby of people.

Even if this game has still a few bugs, Nemega is trying his best to make this game as enjoyable as possible. He already released three patches, so I don't think this will be a problem.

Overall if you enjoy jump 'n' runs or speedruns and if you are up for a challenge, try it out. I never saw a game like this before and I really enjoy it. You could say this game has endless content with the randomized levels and there will also be a new mode added in the future. This game is worth the price.

38342004.review:
期待了很久的IWBTC终于在steam上线了，跳票了有大概半年吧——也是因为游戏一直在不断地完善内容。

虽然接触I wanna都已经快四年了，最早是室友给我看了珠峰的I wanna conquer many traps得知了这一系列的同人游戏。
……（此处省略一万字）

========

首先作为第一款登陆Steam面向更广泛受众的I wanna Fangame，肯定需要有诸多的考虑和折衷，避免以往Fangame中的一些习惯以及过于硬核的内容，简单总结一下：
1. 游戏默认键位由传统的Shift跳跃、Z射击，改成了Z跳跃、X射击、C冲刺，作为一个I wanna玩家进游戏的第一件事就是改回来XD
2. 跳跃最大高度增加了，尤其是二段跳，所以像F阶这类依赖极限的二段跳高度的跳跃变得容易了很多。
3. 跳跃最小高度降低了，小跳变得更容易按出来，但是像克星刺这类原本是需要4或5帧的跳跃，现在好像变成了需要5或6帧（我的大概感觉，如果有误欢迎指出）。
4. 很多在block上/下接一个刺的刺阵可以按住方向键直接滑/跳了。在传统IW里这类刺一般需要准确控制方向键才能过，只有达成特定条件，满足特定的v string（包括垂直速度、垂直的位置，甚至sub-pixel的位置）情况下才能在两帧之间避开伤害判定，直接滑过去（可以说是一种bug）。而在Cat里似乎只要垂直速度够快就都能滑过去，不论是向下还是向上。
5. 同上，在block左/右接的刺都能滑出去接二段，而不像传统IW需要依赖特定的align，如果是小刺则能直接滑出去不需要跳跃。
6. 藤蔓的修改是最明显的一个，直接在藤蔓上按跳跃键就能起跳，并且始终有二段，这对新手玩家来说友好了很多。这么改的缺点是，传统IW里的藤蔓能设计出的各种神奇的跳跃和绕路、保留二段的技巧之类的没法利用了。水也同样，变成了出水始终有二段跳。另外板子不会像传统IW里那样只要碰到了就会被带着跑。
7. 目前的关卡设计也更偏向于综合性质的跳跃，而不像很多IW里的纯跳刺——当然就纯跳刺而言，我想多数玩家还是更倾向于原本的物理引擎而不是这个魔改版的。

========

#单人模式

单人模式和传统IW很大的不同之处在于Roguelike元素的引进：
关卡是随机从地图库中挑选的而不是固定的
Boss同样是随机挑选，并且Boss战中Cat是有血条的
总的死亡次数是有限制的
可以通关获得/购买道具、技能来增强能力、恢复血条、增加生命数

这些元素的加入让游戏变得更加随机和多样了，也存在道具技能在选择、决策上的讲究，不容易显得太过单调。

作为一个手残，我尝试了三次，才通关了Medium难度：
第一次因为还不熟悉玩法，当成传统IW在送，浪费了大把生命，中途就Game Over
第二次打到了Final Boss，然后被血虐到gg
第三次终于成功征服了Final Boss

这游戏还有Hard难度和Impossible难度，然而这个IMP更像是在玩I wanna的梗。因为对那些IW的高手们来说，这个IMP就跟传统IW里Medium差不多的感觉……
只不过，手残的我试了一次Hard，就倒在了中途。。。

========

#多人模式

多人模式则是比较欢乐的竞速形式，同样是随机生成的地图，分为Easy、Medium、Hard——难度上分别对应了单人模式的Medium、Hard、Impossible。甚至从关卡设计来说，多人的Hard可能比单人的Impossible更难一点（因为单人是有生命限制的）。

一个比较有意思的点是，当有玩家到了终点以后，会倒计时30秒结束游戏。
这对于新手玩家来说其实是很不友好的，尤其是考虑到经常在玩的大都是圈内人。即便是同样的圈内人，由于水平和熟悉程度的不同，依然可能会被拉开很大的差距。
所以很多人到了终点以后会选择等待后面的人，最后大家一起进终点——这种和谐有爱的氛围无疑是很好的，值得每个人努力去维护。
因此，我有个建议是在终点附近加更多可以自娱自乐的东西——现在的我们只能跳跳周围的悬崖和F阶，还有把最后一个save反复跑，就没别的事情做了……

说说之前我和两个路人玩时很有意思的事情。
当时我们开了一把Easy，开了几把Medium，每一次我都落在最后——因为我总是死在一些莫名其妙的失误上。
还有一个原因是，IWBTC里加入了传统IW没有的冲刺技能，这可以增加在很多地方的速度，尤其是一些需要动态躲避的东西，提供了原本平地走不可能通过的线路。但是，因为习惯的原因，总是会忘记使用（在单人模式里我就没有用过）。于是这一次我就试着尽量能用就用，结果大大破坏了我的节奏，总是各种莫名其妙地就作死了……
绝望中我想起了Hard难度，就开了一把Hard试试看，然后等我用了9分30秒到了终点时，他们两个还在第2-4个save挣扎……可能因为Hard难度还是更考验长存档里稳定的操作，而不用拼过关的速度，在这方面我还是领先他们的；另一个原因是有几个save在原先测试版的cat里就玩过了XD

========

#关卡设计

IWBTC的关卡设计（level design）无疑是高水平的，通关单人模式后我们可以在Credit里看到很多熟悉的ID，大都是西方的fangame社区里熟练于I wanna制作的大佬们，他们有的人做过的图可能都接近上千张了，无疑都是非常熟练的（

而由于cat目前的关卡强调各种元素组合搭配的综合性设计，在高质量的基础上，更增加了关卡的乐趣性。据说目前总的关卡已经达到了2000多个，这是个相当恐怖的数字了，单人模式的Boss也有12个。

但是局限性，也同样存在着。

和传统IW相比，现在的关卡少了很重要的一个东西就是坑（trap）。
是因为制作偷懒了？引擎不支持触发？那肯定不是，可以看到现在的关卡设计里就有通过开关的触发，来引起场景的变化，所以技术上肯定不存在不能做坑的情况。
可以认为的原因是目前游戏模式的设计。
单人模式是生命有限，所以做初见杀会导致游戏体验极差，特别是对新玩的人很不友好——并且考虑到关卡是随机的，要想把所有关卡都背板，需要付出大量的时间成本。
而多人的竞速模式中，坑的存在也会对竞速的流畅体验带来影响，并且同样存在着对新人不友好，依赖背板的问题。

另一个传统IW里最常见的东西就是抄袭，IW经常会抄袭其他游戏里的玩法创意、场景设计、画风、Boss战。很多经典游戏自然不必说，今年FASF大会的游戏里甚至还有抄袭Braid和The End is Nigh的。
作为一个传统，其基础也是因为IW系列的同人游戏都是免费的，所以通常不会涉及到商业侵权的问题。而IWBTC在Steam上售卖，就不得不考虑这些问题了。
玩法创意这些本来就难以说是谁发明的，所以IWBTC的关卡设计来说不存在抄袭了什么东西的问题。
而Boss战是目前最明显的“抄袭”部分，我们能看到很多熟悉的角色和Boss技能，但是为了避免侵权，全部都Cat化了……而且这游戏的Boss设计上抄袭的最明显的其实是作者的前作I wanna be the Co-Op，既视感非常强。。。
Final Boss则是抄袭界的精英，抄袭的集大成者，首先他抄袭了本家的final boss——The Guy，从设计上，又大量借鉴了抄袭界的祖宗Kamilia 3的final Boss，并在第二阶段直接援引了前面出现过的所有Boss。

========

#展望

从目前的主界面来看，接下去准备扩展魔塔的模式，也就是类似于Not Another Magic Tower Game那样的，NAMTG无疑是一款非常优秀又十分独特的Fangame（但作为Boss战苦手，难度对我来说也太高了），所以这种模式也很令人期待。

Workshop是另一个值得期待的重点，毕竟IW系列的Fangame之所以有生命力就是因为广大的同人游戏制作，若是玩家们都能分享自己制作的关卡，游戏的生命力就会被大大延长。

除此之外，不知道有没有打算做Co-op模式，作者Nemaga的前作I wanna be the Co-op是我个人认为最好玩的IW，没有之一。
之前我和一个没怎么玩过IW的朋友一起通关了Co-op，因为它的设计很大程度上就考虑了让一个老玩家带新玩家（很多save设计为一个人比较简单另一个人比较难的情况），所以这对于游戏推广就是很有利的了。
而且单从玩法上来说，Co-op设计的很多元素都非常新颖也很有趣，尤其是结合两个人需要配合才能完成的任务，非常具有互动性。两个人合作，经过一次次的努力尝试，终于通过一个档的成就感是一个人玩时没法比的。。。

38337063.review: A game by the boys for the boys.

38334407.review: As the name implies, this is a hardcore platformer heavily inspired by I Wanna Be The Guy-based fangames. If you've heard of I Wanna Be The Guy before, you may know it's a mostly unfair trial-and-error based platformer focusing on comedic traps. Despite the mechanics and controls in this game being inspired by it, it's a very different experience. Rather than traps, this game wants you to methodically approach rooms, looking at what's going on before jumping in, since you have a limited number of lives. If you can handle difficult games, I'd recommend it - singleplayer alone is a great time, multiplayer races are chaotic and a ton of fun, and the developer has promised to add more stuff after launch. Given his previous game got a ton of updates after launch adding more content and fixes, and this game has already gotten two important patches very quickly, I have no doubt this'll be true here as well.

38333009.review:
Although I've only had about an hour and a half with the game so far, I'm really enjoying it!

There are 3 options available as for difficulty of the game which you select before you begin a run. I've only attempted the "normal" setting (which is the lowest)  3 times as of now, and failed at about the 4th world each time. Each run was different, giving the best feelings of both hand-crafted and random design. I never saw any levels twice, and the level structure felt natural, with a steadily climbing difficulty curve that felt fair(still hard as stone though!). You get coins during the regular gameplay to buy items and perks from shops, and when you finally lose all 100 lives, you receive more coins to buy some permanent upgrades to aid in future runs. I may not be far enough in the game yet to make this call, but I thought this might make subsequent playthroughs seem more trivial. Even so, it seems the devs have balanced for this, and none of the items seem like they will make you OP in any fashion at all. There's also an option to turn them off altogether, for the truly daring and skilled.

Other thoughts:

The way the devs described this game on the Steam page with terms like "procedural generation" and "randomly generated levels" was really off-putting to me on first inspection. "IWBTG" and clones of it are in part famous for their pixel perfect jumps and the high skill/patience necessary to get through the stages. This basically had me picturing a HAL 5000 filling every inch of the screen with insta-kill spikes on level 1.. And because of that, I thought that I wanna be The Cat might fail by leaving the course of the game up to algorithm. 

I was totally off the mark.

I must have missed the bit where they say 2000+ levels were designed by hand. I think that THIS is what they should be putting in bold for everyone to see. The procedural generation comes in the weaving of these levels together into a larger world (or, that's what it seems like to me!)  and seems to do an excellent job of it. I was a late-comer to the IWBTG world, but I am undoubtedly a huge fan of what it represents. It was both a throwback to the more "unforgiving" games of yesteryear, and even a reaction to the handholding fare of its time. It provided a challenge unlike any other, and most of that challenge was truly rewarding - its code was the one huge flaw, and has made the game unplayable in modern times for a lot of people, becoming a challenge just to get it run. I wanna be the Cat, as a game, gives more people the chance to try their hand at a would-be "official release" at this sort of game, and so far it seems to be an honest effort with solid gameplay. It is also the first non-free clone of IWBTG to have come out, as far as I'm aware, which might seem off-putting to some.

But I think it's worth the money.

38332979.review:
I am absolutely loving this. The rogue-lite elements are implemented very well and bring the game to a whole new level and the sheer number of levels in this makes this a platformers dream.

There are three difficulty levels, each one caters to different skillsets close to perfection. I could definitely see someone who is brand new to platformers pick this up and enjoying the lower difficulty, and highly experienced players having a blast with the higher difficulties aswell.

At first I was a bit sad to see that the bosses just die in 5 seconds flat, you don't really get to see what they even do. However, I was very pleased to see that the game incorporates boss scaling. The scaling is dependant on how far you are in the game, aswell as which difficulty you are playing. The bosses gain more HP, attacks get more complex and even additional phases with new attacks with the scaling.

I really have to mention the online racing aspect of the game. It's super chaotic, hectic and way more fun than you would expect. Me and a couple of friends went and tried this yesterday, and we just couldn't stop playing. We played for 4 and a half hours straight before I finally stopped because I was too tired (I actually wanted to keep playing haha). You've gotta try the racing if you play this!

Everything mentioned combined with the low asking price makes this an absolute must play for anyone who likes platformers, I'm really enjoying my time with this!

38326476.review:
Are you a fan of "I wanna" games? Are you a fan of roguelike games? If you said "yes" on either of those questions, you must try this game.

The game has 2000+ levels which get picked at random - each playthrough is different.
You're actually allowed to take damage on bosses, which is super rare in "I wanna" games.
You can buy permanent upgrades, making each subsequent playthrough easier.
And it has 3 difficulty options, with the easiest option being just the right difficulty for everyone to enjoy.

This is one of the best "I Wannas" I ever played, and one of the best roguelikes, too! I absolutely recommend it.

38318685.review:
Думаю, многие игроки в фангеймы по мотивам I Wanna Be The Guy слышали про эту игру, поэтому этот обзор скорее для обычных игроков.
Что же представляет собой I Wanna Be The Cat? Это платформер-рогалик - то есть каждое прохождение игры будет не похоже на предыдущее. Игра поделена на 4 мира, в каждом из которых определенное количество экранов (точное количество не помню). Всего в игре более 2000 разных экранов, но всегда есть вероятность, что при одном из следующих прохождений вы попадете на знакомый экран. На прохождение дается 100 жизней.
Что касается самого геймплея. Игра представляет из себя довольно непростой платформер с немалым количеством точных прыжков. Перед началом прохождения стоит пройти обучение, которое ознакомит новичков со многими игровыми механиками (к сожалению, не все игровые механики объяснены). Если вы до этого никогда не играли в фангеймы по мотивам IWBTG, то игра может показаться вам сложноватой. Тем не менее, в игре присутствует выбор уровня сложности: medium, hard, impossible (новичкам рекомендуется начать играть на medium). Для каждого уровня сложности имеется свой набор карт. Кроме того, уровни сложности отличаются наличием у боссов новых атак, а иногда даже целых фаз. Кстати о боссах: если на обычных уровнях персонаж умирает от попадания на шипы или иное другое препятствие, то для битвы с боссом нам дается 100 хп. Разные атаки боссов отбирают разное количество здоровья. Когда счетчик хп опустится до нуля, то у нас снимают 10 жизней.
В игре есть предметы и навыки, которые можно купить в процессе прохождения за внутриигровую валюту или жизни, а также найти в сундуке или секрутном уровне. Предметы зачастую одноразовые (дополнительный прыжок, пополнение здоровья и т. п.), а навыки - постоянные (увеличение атаки, увеличение защиты и т. п.).
Кроме режима для прохождения, здесь есть онлайн-гонка на 8 игроков. Выбирается уровень сложности, сид (если нужно). Цель - первым добраться до конца сгенерированного мира. Количество жизней неограничено. Когда кто-то добирается до финиша, остальным игрокам дается меньше минуты, чтобы добраться до конца, затем гонка заканчивается.
В дальнейшем разработчик игры планирует добавить еще один игровой режим.
В игре есть поддержка геймпада. Dualshock 4 спокойно определяется.
На момент релиза было несколько багов: иногда чуть-чуть падал framerate, онлайн-гонка зависала в самом начале (нужно просто перезапустить игру). Думаю, в дальнейшем все это будет исправлено.
Итак, стоит ли покупать игру? Если вам нравятся сложные платформеры - однозначно стоит. К тому же цена за игру с высокой реиграбельностью совсем маленькая (148 рублей в момент релиза и 175 рублей в дальнейшем).

38313837.review:
I like this game. The platforming is challenging and fun.  
You can get used to the intended difficulty by playing the easiest difficulty first. Progressing on the harder difficulties is really satisfying.

Cool bosses that are very fun to learn and beat! They are all references to other games or internet culture, very fun!

Items/skills are optional, but when used cleverly you can use it to skip hard levels fast. Experimenting with them is recommended. 

Looking forward to the coming magic tower mode!

38313512.review:
The final boss on hard mode is pretty learn-y so be prepared for that, and that somewhat turned me off from single player mode but don't let that deter you from giving the game a go; I just hate bosses that require learning to get down. 

I tried doing races but some of the segments in the game are way too choke-able in its current state, and the visuals often make me waste time trying to figure out what to do since I can't actually see some of the major elements of the level. There were also a few segments that are way too precise for races at all. Hopefully this will get smoothed out in future updates because I see a lot of potential in this portion of the game, and I really want to be able to enjoy it despite the fact that I generally just don't have fun trying to do gimmicky platforming fast.

Despite these complaints, in its current state i do feel its worth giving a go.

Edit: after playing races more, I've come to heavily enjoy them. Just had to get used to the visuals and physics a bit more. I suppose be warned, there is a slight learning curve for the game at the start but once you fully immerse yourself it's an absolutely amazing game.

38312474.review: Cool game, lots of unlockables and replayability as well as another game mode that will be added soon.

38311386.review:
Плюсы:
-Сложность. Да, новичакам возможно будет не по душе столь высокая планка сложности, но ценителям I wanna be the Guy фан игр будет в самый раз.
-Мультиплеер. Можно гонять рейсы с друзьями или рандомными игроками по различных картах.
-Боссы. Тут нечего говорить, вы должны сами их увидеть.
-Апгрейды. После вашей смерти, вы попадаете в меню прокачки вашего кота, в котором довольно много апгрейдов которые помогут в дальнейших забегах.
-Первая фан игра I wanna be the Guy в стиме. Тут и так всё понятно.
Минусы:
-Их почти нет. Есть маленькие косяки и баги как к примеру: иногда игра зависает если вы хотите стартануть рейс в мультиплеере и приходиться перезапускать её. Но я уверен в дальнейшем это все исправят :D
Итог:
10/10

38310191.review:
Отличный платформер-рогалик с очень точной физикой и механикой (знакомой по IWBTG фангеймам), которая позволяет хорошо чувствовать персонажа и выполнять тонкие прыжки. Боссы являются персонажами из других игр, однако замаскированных под кошек (такие как соник, мегамен, баузер, пикачу, чирно из тохо и другие).
Я играл сразу на сложности hard, потому что у меня уже есть опыт в IWBTG фангеймах. За 3 часа я дошёл до, предположительно, финального босса 3 раза (по канонам жанра после того, как у игрока заканчиваются жизни, он начинает игру с начала, но с покупкой апгрейда, который остаётся навсегда).
Также присутствует сетевая игра, представляющая собой гонки по случайно генерируемому уровню. Кстати в одиночной игре уровни тоже генерируются случайным образом, при чём если один и тот же кусок уровня попадается на разном этапе игры, то он автоматически становится легче/сложнее. Тоже самое и с боссами. Так что каждый следующий забег может очень сильно отличаться от предыдущего, каждый раз практически новая игра.

38309668.review:

And I will also make sure to fully finish this.

Graphics are simple and good. Level design is spot on with possible skips by using the items often available. Bosses are just a lot of fun if a bit too easy. Music is good!
If you're a gaming masochist and wont mind dying a lot, this game is for you!

38308641.review:
等了这么久终于sell了，凌晨爬起来购买并且小玩了一会儿。
BGM很喜欢，跳跃手感也还不错。虽然默认键位不一样，但有改键就无妨了。
游戏内元素也繁多，不只是单一的跳刺，所以玩起来并不枯燥无聊。
但是...爬墙啊爬墙啊.... 好奇怪的爬墙啊..orz（玩多了就会适应，并不算什么缺点。）
综合来看是非常棒的一部iwanna作品，还没有购入的dalao们快行动起来吧。
萌新瑟瑟发抖~看着你们秀触就好。

38308312.review:
Fair platforming game with a lot of gimmicks. Has a ton of levels and quite a few bosses and items that make the replay-value of this game insanely high! That, combined with the beautiful art and music, makes me recommend this game!
Little warning: you are going to die often, so I would like to refer to it as 'learning'! 
Pros:
-Insane replay-value
-Medium mode to start with and very hard modes to test your skills
-Races that you can do with others
-Everytime you 'learn', it is your own fault!
Cons:
-Since every run consists of different levels, it may take some time for you to improve
-It is frustrating if you lose a run and have to start over

38307753.review:
Первый фангейм по мотивам I Wanna Be The Guy прошедший Steam Greenlight, и являющийся результатом работы такого замечательного разработчика как Nemega, автора I Wanna Be The CO-OP.
Вкупе со сногсшибательной 2D графикой, у игры потрясающий собственный саундтрек, море разнообразного контента и несколько игровых режимов, ключевым из которых, конечно же, является сетевой гоночный. Именно в этой фишке заключается главная особенность I Wanna Be The Cat, в сравнении с остальными фангеймами. Именно гоночный азарт, которого так недостаёт в большинстве фангеймов, и является в этом проекте вишенкой на торте.
Режим одиночной игры так же не отстаёт. Игроков ждёт уникальная система навыков и перков, аналогов которой не найти ни в одном другом существующем [на момент выхода игры] фангейме по мотивам IWBTG. Боссы, с восхитительной реализаций, и в которых внимательные игроки заметят отсылки к I Wanna Be The Guy, Boshy, Kill the Guy, серии Kill the Kamilia и многим другим. Ну, и конечно же, игроки поопытнее смогут испытать себя в более тяжёлых уровнях сложности и сборе достижений, коих здесь, благо, огромное множество!
Рекомендую ли я эту игру любителям I Wanna Be The Guy, Boshy и остальных фангеймов? Однозначно!
Стоит ли игру пробовать людям не знакомым с IWBTG-фангейм тематикой? Почему бы нет! Несмотря на то, что игра определенно предлагает новичкам вызов, в игре присутствует поддержка игровых режимов разной сложности. Набраться опыта сможет каждый, однако кому-то всё же придётся проявить терпение и усидчивость. =)
I Wanna Be The Cat - это превосходный фангейм по мотивам I Wanna Be The Guy, и просто сама по себе замечательная игра.

38307554.review: This is a challenging platformer game that was inspired by I Wanna Be The Guy fangames. It's a perfect game for those who enjoy playing the fangames or difficult platforming games. This game even features a race where you can play with up to 8 players, which is really fun. Don't worry if you're not good at these games, there are difficulty options you can choose from.

38307439.review:
A fangame on Steam.
It's a dream that has come true.
Everyone rejoice!

(THIS IS A HAIKU MOTHERFUCKERS)

38307416.review: It's a very polished and fun I wanna be the Guy fangame. I bought it for the online race mode and its super fun to race against friends through the random generated levels!

38306542.review:
A difficult but fun platformer with rogue-like elements. 

Pros:
-Challenging platforming
-A sense of progression and accomplishment
-Multiplayer
-Entertaining boss fights with different mechanics
-A HUGE variety of levels
-An obvious amount of love was put into the development of this game
-Controller support

Cons:
-Challenging Platforming
-Occasional framerate drops on high quality (on release, might be patched)

I love these types of games and have been following the developer for a while waiting for this game to come out and I am not disappointed. With multiple difficulty settings its great for those who are new to the genre and veterans alike. All the references in the bosses are very well thought out and executed nicely while also matching the atmosphere of the game flawlessly. The platforming can be difficult but its rewarding enough to want to keep pushing through to get coins for more powerups or just to see how far you can make it this time.

There is also a multiplayer mode where you can race against your friends or complete strangers to see who is the ultimate cat! The levels flow nicely together so that in a race if something goes wrong you know its your own fault rather than the games.

You can tell how much love and care was put into this game and I can recommend it to almost anyone.

38305797.review: This game is a rogue-like platformer inspired by I Wanna be the Guy and its many fangames. With tight controls, interesting levels, great visuals and a good soundtrack, this game is charming and is a must for any platformer lovers, even if you aren't too skilled in them, as there are multiple difficulty options. The game has tons of replayability even in just singleplayer, not even counting the online race mode the game features, which is also a lot of fun. The fact that the dev plans to keep adding more and more content for free is also a nice plus.

38305115.review:
给I wanna加上roguelite元素真的很棒。
能联机也是非常吼的。
请喜欢I wanna的玩家快点加入吧！

39340807.review:
在steam上出现i wanna游戏，感觉还是蛮新奇的，游戏挺好玩的。rougelike模式，随机换图，对于我这种手残来说，图是完全够了的，但是如果有个创意工坊能够自己做图就更好了。
-游戏画面会随着人物移动，相当的不爽，画面动来动去，如果改成画面的放大缩小比较好。
-爬墙果然是痛，但是习惯了还好。
-为什么单人模式没有easy！！？？手残表示根本通不了关【o(╥﹏╥)o

永远无法全成就的游戏
推荐

39338226.review: 好难啊QAQ！！别人大神都是三天通关，我怎么就三天成功达成死亡999次的成就啊orz！！！

39236177.review:
He estado jugando I wanna be the cat por bastante rato y la primera vez que lo completé (Dificultad Normal) tardé 5 horas y media. No hay mucho que decir la verdad, lo bosses y los niveles estan testeados al máximo y los controles son buenos.

Lo único que no me gustó fue el cooldown de los bosses para recibir daño, la horrible curva de dificultad del nivel 2 al 3, el sistema roguelike y hp que siento que están ahí solo por estar y el sistema de vidas, le quita un poco la gracia a de los "I wanna be (...)" 

A pesar de todo es un buen juego, lo pasé bien y una vez hasta me salió una ampolla en los dedos del vicio que le metí.
Altamente recomendado, 8/10,

39119945.review:
A "Original Mode" would be nice, with dumb vine controls and all! Events also, no trolls in this game unfortunatly!

It's polished, bosses are fun (3 difficulties and hp bar for easy learning curve is very forgiving) and the "don't expect to win' mechanic really shows the roots of this game! Don't expect to beast through real guygames if you win this on impossible, base game's not aligned to the original tiles. jumping is a bit different and the vines (climbable walls(as mentioned above) are ez-mode! You get doublejumps on anything, really confusing if you've just finished a gamemaker one!
And cherries should stay red! (or at least some vibrant color!)

39050519.review:
Steam上第一款真正意义上的iwanna游戏。

[h1]第一印象[/h1]
无论是操作手感还是关卡布局都完美贴合iw系列，作为弃坑一两年的人玩起来仍有种熟悉感。
操作上不同的是加入了很有用的冲刺技能，另外爬墙变无脑了，反而不习惯……

[h1]关卡设计方面[/h1]
首先随机组合的关卡重玩不会枯燥，道中还包含了很多经典元素，比如机关、传送、追逐、时间差等，具有一定解谜成分。也没有出现无脑坑，整体游戏体验良好。
关卡的衔接上也做得很用心，虽然是打乱顺序的关卡，但由于每面的完美衔接，玩起来很流畅。
游戏还在原关卡基础上设计了富有挑战性的奖励关，给有能力的玩家选择，可以当成两种路线来玩，设计得很巧妙。

另外道具系统也比较有意思，有些道具有自带作弊效果，比如多段跳、传送和无敌……如果这种东西掉率更高就好了！（玩的时候遇到一个似乎是无解的切换砖块关卡，最后用传送道具跳过去的……

[h1]Boss方面[/h1]
由关底和最终boss组成，关底是由许多boss中随机选出来的，不容易审美疲劳，选取的素材neta了很多熟悉的iw（不过都是猫化的，也算点题了……）最终boss致敬了本家，还加了bossrush式的耐久，甚至弹幕和细节都有所还原。
只是耐久弹幕不够看，感觉是为了刷存在感而跑出来浪费时间的……而且由于人物带血条，容错率更高，还有为了避免初见杀的贴心危险提示，各方面都对新手玩家很友好。

[h1]难度方面[/h1]
除了奖励关卡，游戏的难度设计也大大加强了可玩性和挑战性，
不同于大多数iw的是，除了medium难度外，hard和imp难度并不影响存档数量，而直接强化关卡布局，做出全新关卡（boss貌似血更厚了）。这样不仅能满足各种水平的玩家，挑战多周目也不枯燥。
从难度设计上足以看出其用心程度。

然而高难度对于我这种长年没玩的手残来说太zzz了。试了下imp，后面的道中长啥样都没见到……

毕竟剩余生命摆在那，会导致越死越慌，甚至能过的都死了。而看着所剩无几的生命，又感觉没有玩下去的必要……那种无奈和绝望感，才是游戏中最大的敌人。

虽然游戏是往roguelite的方向看齐，可以通过刷金币升级来降低过关门槛，然而一周目下来少得不足挂齿的金币实在是刷不动……

作为iw玩家的基本素养，就是不怕卡关，只怕不给卡关的机会。
所以建议搞个无限条命的抖m模式……享受原汁原味的放烟花乐趣（不

[h1]关于联机[/h1]
看别人玩过了，挺有意思的。自己没玩，没什么好说……挂不挂网络工具都刷不房间，难道是玩的人太少了？小众游戏固然好，但刷不出房间也太没游戏体验了……（绝不是因为没朋友

-------------------------------
虽然弃坑已久，但毕竟是大学几年一度热爱沉迷过的游戏系列，也很喜欢这款在steam上具有里程碑意义的iw。希望能延续下去，越做越好。完善一下联机、排行榜、自定义关卡等系统（比如对战排位？）能吸引更多人加入游戏。

38976924.review:
看评测来说，基本都是好评，证明选择这款游戏的大多都是IW玩家233
作为第一款登录steam的IW，首先在价格上还是比较满意的，即使一些非IW玩家也可以尝试的价格，可调节的难度也不会让人选择-1，虽然操作方法和常规IW不一样，但依然不会影响它是一款好游戏，双人模式适合竞技，可惜不能和coop一样配合通关，命数的限制显得稍微有点怪，毕竟IW一直是越战越勇的特点，而且后面会有所提升，场景也是随机的，来不及练习就死完是很正常的（当然那些触手不会），希望未来能多个不限制命数的模式或者练习模式吧。
任何一位IW老玩家都不会想错过这款游戏的我觉得233新玩家也可以尝试一样，也许你会打开不一样的（抖M）开关

38965102.review:
首先声明，并不是给游戏的差评，只是目前不推荐购买。
游戏是好游戏，可以调节难度，新手上手也不会太困难。
不推荐的理由是，目前来说，镜头会跟着主角移动，而在镜头移动期间会出现掉帧的情况，对于这样的硬核游戏来说，无论画面多好，情节多棒，只要掉帧影响到操作那就是死罪，所以希望开发商继续努力，期待这款游戏的正式版。

38964543.review:
1.我们都知道这款游戏名字叫I wanna be the cat，翻译成中文就是我想成为猫
2.主角一开始就拥有100条命，但是猫只有九条，为什么主角要自愿失去91条命呢，这些命去了哪里？
3.商店里能买到让时间停止的道具以及额外的命，那么这些店会是谁开的呢？
4.游戏里的弹簧需要长按shift进行蓄力才能跳的很高，而我们知道蛤蟆也需要蓄力，来扑食空中的昆虫
5.主角在上一步失误撞刺时，生命值会减一
6.主角可以进行冲刺，跑的比谁都快，这是其他iw主角做不到的
